title: Introduction
content:
* Title: Electromagnetic Fields
* Subtitle: An Overview

title: Structure
content:
* Title: Structure of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Electric field (E) and magnetic field (B) vectors
	+ Electric and magnetic potentials (V and A)
	+ Faraday's law of induction

title: Continuous Structure
content:
* Title: Continuous Structure of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Electromagnetic waves and their properties (frequency, wavelength, etc.)
	+ Dispersion relations and the speed of electromagnetic waves

title: Discrete Structure
content:
* Title: Discrete Structure of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Photons and their properties (energy, momentum, etc.)
	+ Quantized electromagnetic fields and the photoelectric effect

title: Dynamics
content:
* Title: Dynamics of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Lorentz force and the Abraham-Lorentz equation
	+ Acceleration of charged particles in electromagnetic fields

title: Feedback Loop
content:
* Title: Feedback Loop in Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Interaction between electric and magnetic fields
	+ Self-induction and mutual induction

title: Mathematical Description
content:
* Title: Mathematical Description of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Maxwell's equations (Gauss's law, Faraday's law, Ampere's law)
	+ Electromagnetic wave equation

title: Properties of the Field
content:
* Title: Properties of the Electromagnetic Field
* Bullet points:
	+ Reciprocal behavior of electric and magnetic fields
	+ Behavior of the fields in the absence of charges or currents

title: Relation to Other Physical Fields
content:
* Title: Relation to Other Physical Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Gravitational field and its relation to electromagnetic fields
	+ Other physical fields (such as the strong and weak nuclear fields)

title: Applications
content:
* Title: Applications of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Electric power generation and distribution
	+ Electronics and communication technology
	+ Medical applications (MRI, microwave ablation, etc.)

title: Static E and M Fields
content:
* Title: Static E and M Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Electric and magnetic fields in static equilibrium
	+ Electric potential and magnetic flux

title: Static EM Fields
content:
* Title: Static Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Electric and magnetic fields in static equilibrium
	+ Electric potential and magnetic flux

title: Time-Varying EM Fields (Maxwell's Equations)
content:
* Title: Time-Varying Electromagnetic Fields (Maxwell's Equations)
* Bullet points:
	+ Gauss's law for electric fields
	+ Faraday's law of induction
	+ Ampere's law with Maxwell's correction

title: Other
content:
* Title: Other Aspects of Electromagnetic Fields
* Bullet points:
	+ Health and safety considerations when working with electromagnetic fields
	+ Historical background and development of the theory of electromagnetic fields

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
